text: Denges is a municipality in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. It is located in the district of Morges and is situated on the north shore of Lake Geneva. The village of Denges has a population of approximately 1,500 people and covers an area of 1.67 square kilometers. It is surrounded by farmland and vineyards, and is known for its beautiful countryside and charming Swiss architecture. == References == == Other websites == * Official website
title: Denges
